\n
\n
We’d seen a spin bike online and popped in to see if it was suitable.\nAran who served us was friendly, knowledgeable and professional. He gave us advice without being pushy and we left knowing that we had the right product for our needs. We will definitely be back to look for more home gym equipment
\n
\n
\n
\n
Amanda Robinson
\n
Customer
\n
\n
"},{"content":"
\n
\n
Love Codazon Toys! The employees are very happy to help and give suggestions. The events they do to bring people in all over the community are wonderful!\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Daniel Radcliffe
\n
Customer
\n
\n
"},{"content":"
\n
\n
So much variety and the employees are always helpful. My daughter loves to be able to play and try out many of the toys before we buy them, we love Codazon Toys!\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
Stephanie
\n
Customer
\n
\n
